body_html: I have the exact same issue. For my case, the calls to torch.Tensor(var.size()).normal_() and torch.Tensor(var.size()).bernoulli_() in the function of the threads were causing the problem. Once I took them out, the segfaults stopped appearing.

body: I have the exact same issue. For my case, the calls to torch.Tensor(var.size()).normal_() and torch.Tensor(var.size()).bernoulli_() in the function of the threads were causing the problem. Once I took them out, the segfaults stopped appearing.
